title: LittleLemonAPI
description: RESTful API developed with Django REST Framework focused on restaurant operations and role-based access control. The system includes user authentication, order management, shopping cart functionality, and differentiated permissions for customers, managers, and delivery crew. Designed with clear separation of concerns and business rules enforcement at the API level.

title: Oraculum
description: AI-powered web chatbot built with React and TypeScript that integrates the OpenAI API to generate dynamic conversational responses. The project focuses on asynchronous data handling, external API integration, state management, and user experience for conversational interfaces, with a clear separation between UI and service logic.

title: Urban Soles
description: Frontend MVP for an e-commerce platform focused on user flows, UI architecture, and state management. Built with React and TypeScript, the application includes authentication simulation, product catalog, user profile management, order history, and payment method handling using mock data. Designed to be easily extendable for backend integration.

title: ArquiReforma
description: Single-page landing application developed for an architecture and renovation studio, focused on modern UI, responsiveness, and smooth user interactions. The project emphasizes layout composition, reusable components, and visual polish through animations and styling.

title: React Calculator
description: Basic calculator application built with React to demonstrate core concepts such as component composition, state management, and event handling. Focused on reinforcing React fundamentals and clean UI behavior for simple user interactions.
